name: methylseq-test
description: nf-core/methylseq is a bioinformatics analysis pipeline used for Methylation (Bisulfite) sequencing data. It pre-processes raw data from FastQ inputs, aligns the reads and performs extensive quality-control on the results.
content: Methylation analysis pipeline for bisulfite sequencing data with custom FASTA reference support.
command: export NXF_CACHE_DIR=/camber_work/temp/.nextflow; export NXF_LOG_FILE=/home/camber/jobs/3302/outputs/nextflow.log; cd /home/camber/methylseq_clean && nextflow run nf-core/methylseq --input ${input} --outdir ${output} --fasta ${fasta} -r ${revision} -c /etc/mpi/nextflow.camber.config -ansi-log false -profile k8s
